question: Who among the following authors wrote "Hasanaat ul-Aarifin"?
explanation: Dara Shikoh, the eldest son of the Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan, wrote Hasanaat ul-Aarifin (virtues of the saints). Some of the famous works done by him are Safinat ul- Awliya, Sakinat ul-Awliya, Risaala-i Haq Numa, Iksir-i \'Azam (Diwan-e-Dara Shukoh), etc.
